name: Spelldraft
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Place element cards and form matches to score points and advance to the next spell.

But be careful, if you score too many points, the spell will become unstable!

Reach the minimum score without exceeding the maximum score in this blackjack-inspired card-matching.

ELEMENT MATCHES:

  • Fire: 3 points if adjacent to 2 other Fire cards;
  • Air: 2 points if not adjacent to any other Air card;
  • Earth: 2 points for each adjacent Water card;
  • Water: 2 points for each adjacent Fire card (flips* them over).

* Flipped Fire cards cannot be matched with other Fire cards.

ALSO:

Press R to restart a level.

Made for Ludum Dare 49.
